title: Pilot-less air taxi takes off in Vienna demonstration flight
text: As carmakers push ahead with self-driving vehicles, an Austrian aerospace company and its Chinese partner showed off their pilot-less "flying taxi" for the first time in Europe on Thursday.

title: MIT terminates funding and research links with China's Huawei and ZTE
text: The Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) is terminating all research and funding links with Chinese tech companies Huawei and ZTE in light of recent U.S. federal probes.
